content:
Here are some healthy, easy-to-digest snack ideas:

1. Fresh fruit: Fruits such as bananas, berries, and melons are easy to digest and packed with nutrients. 2. Yogurt: Yogurt (especially those that contain live and active cultures) provides beneficial bacteria and is a good source of protein. 3. Smoothies: Smoothies made with fresh or frozen fruit, yogurt, and/or protein powder can be a filling and nutritious snack. 4. Hummus and veggies: Hummus (made from chickpeas) is a good source of protein and healthy fats, and pairs well with veggies like carrots, cucumber, peppers, and celery. 5. Rice cakes with nut butter: Rice cakes are easy to digest and provide a neutral base for peanut butter, almond butter, or other nut butter spreads. 6. Hard-boiled eggs: Eggs are a good source of protein and healthy fats, and are easy to digest when boiled. 7. Soups: Soups made from clear broth and easy-to-digest ingredients like veggies and chicken can be a good source of hydration and nutrients. Remember to choose snacks that are low in added sugars and processed ingredients to support healthy digestion and overall health.
